long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling drained from endless, mindless scrolling on websites you don’t even enjoy?

Say hello to ZombiePause—your lightweight and hassle-free companion to reclaim your time and mind. This simple app temporarily blocks those distracting apps and websites that suck away your energy and focus. You decide the duration, giving yourself the mental space to prioritize what truly matters.

Lightweight and easy to use, ZombiePause runs seamlessly in the background without hogging your device's resources. It’s designed to help you take control, not take over.

Stop the zombie behavior and start living intentionally—install ZombiePause today!
